summary:
This mod improves the power of Agent of Nocturnal.
Daedric princes except Nocturnal gives Artifacts at the last of their Quest, so I think Agent of Nocturnal is a substitute for Artifact of Nocturnal.?But I thought the power of Agent of Nocturnal is less uesful than many other Artifacts.?So I made this mod.
descriptionHtml:
[u]I\'m not good at English.  I\'m sorry but You may be hard to read my sentence.[/u]

This mod improves the power of Agent of Nocturnal.

At the last of Thieves Guild Quest you have to lose the Artifact of Nocturnal.
Nocturnal gives the power of Agent of Nocturnal instead.
Daedric princes except Nocturnal gives Artifacts at the last of their Quest, so I think Agent of Nocturnal is a substitute for Artifact of Nocturnal.
But I thought the power of Agent of Nocturnal is less uesful than many other Artifacts.
So I made this mod.

[size=4][color=aqua][b]==Features==[/b][/color][/size]

Nightingale Strife
-Now this spell ignores target\'s magic resistance.
-For every getting 10 levels, you can absorb 50 points more health.
(level 1~10: 100 pts, 11~20: 150 pts, 21~30: 200 pts.......Max is 500 pts)

Nightingale Subterfuge
-Now this spell is Effective to all enemies, and last 40 seconds (from 30s)
-Increased area of the Spell.(about x30)
-Silent(from Loud)

Shadowcloak of Nocturnal
-Changed it to last for 180s

[size=4][color=aqua][b]==Compatibility==[/b][/color][/size]
Compatible with magic overhall mods(for example empowered magic, balanced magic)
And I think compatible with all mods except what change Agent of Nocturnal.

Please also check out my other mod:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27983]Improved Unique Equipment and White Phial - Making much of compatibility[/url]
At first I made \"Improved Agent of Nocturnal\" as a part of this mod. But because Agent of Nocturnal isn\'t \"equipment\" , I made it as the other mod.
author: mikogamiten
